options.name: ⚡ Optimized
options.description: Uses the latest Nextcord and performance optimizations for blazing fast bridging.

options.name: ⚡ Balanced
options.description: Uses performance optimizations for balanced performance and stability. Recommended for most users.

options.description: Uses no performance optimizations. May be slower, but has best stability.
